entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6 CLI Issues - dotnet new --list or dotnet new JSON error / VS project templates #23320
  • Make API Compat check for cases where compiler emits references to internal modreq's in methods #23319
  • Solved by install this update from WU catalog: #23314
  • .NET6 - MSB4236: The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found #23311

Closed

  • [API Compat] Pin Microsoft.CodeAnalysis dependency to 4.0.0 once it ships #22090
    7.0.1xx
  • `dotnet watch run` does not read `appsettings.Development.json` when `--project` is used #23183
  • "dotnet build --no-restore" restores all dependencies #23279

PullRequests

Created

  • Update old preview aka.ms link #23324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542031 #23323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add an option to run dotnet-watch in non-interactive mode #23309
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Catch dotnet watch task cancellation after `CTRL+C` #23316
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update runHelixAndNonHelixInParallel.ps1 #23284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pin Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version for API Compat to the 4.0.x stable package. #23321
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • Add the same condition we have for net 6 to net 7 #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • I noticed that another test handled this better so cleaning up the test code. #23231
    Area-Infrastructure
